summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 20 November to end of Saturday 20 November GMT
description: Further cloudy conditions for Saturday as maritime air from the Atlantic continues to arrive on a south-westerly flow.<br/><br/>Although winds will be quite light for much of the day, there'll be fair dispersion of local emissions allied with little imported pollution.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
